[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.22.0″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#1C50A4″ custom_margin=”||||false|false” custom_padding=”40px||40px||true|false” saved_tabs=”all” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” _builder_version=”4.22.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_margin_tablet=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_margin_phone=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_padding=”10px||0px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”10px||0px||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”0px||0px||false|false” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.22.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.22.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” text_font_size=”14px” link_font=”||||||||” link_text_color=”#ffffff” link_font_size=”14px” background_layout=”dark” module_alignment=”right” custom_margin=”5px||10px||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”5px||10px||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”0px||0px||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”0px||0px||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”0px||2px||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” text_font_size_tablet=”14px” text_font_size_phone=”13px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_line_height_tablet=”” text_line_height_phone=”1.5em” text_line_height_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”left” text_orientation_phone=”left” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_css_main_element=”display: flex;” global_colors_info=”{}”]

 Home

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.23″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”Poppins|||on|||||” header_font_size=”24px” header_letter_spacing=”0.5px” background_layout=”dark” module_alignment=”left” custom_margin=”0px||0px||true|false” header_text_align_tablet=”” header_text_align_phone=”” header_text_align_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Currently NOT COLLECTIBLE

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.22.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.22.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.22.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_heading title=”What is Currently-Not-Collectible (CNC) Status?” _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” title_level=”h2″ title_font=”Libre Caslon Text||||||||” custom_margin=”0px||10px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_heading][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

If you can’t afford to pay your back taxes through an installment agreement or an offer in compromise, you may qualify for currently-not-collectible (CNC) status.

“Currently not collectible” means exactly what it sounds like – the IRS will not take collection actions against you while your CNC status is in place.

It’s important to know that CNC status offers only a temporary solution, one where the IRS agrees to delay collection until your financial situation improves. Being currently not collectible does not erase your tax bill nor does it absolve you from paying your back taxes indefinitely. It simply means the IRS has determined you cannot afford to pay your past-due taxes at this time and, therefore, they’re willing to give you some extra time to get back onto better financial ground.

Prior to approving your request to delay collection, the IRS typically requires you to complete a Collection Information Statement to prove your financial status. Among other things, they may ask for documents pertaining to your income, assets, and expenses; and may require you to file any past-due tax returns.

Be advised that the IRS can continue to add penalties and interest to your tax bill while you’re in CNC status. They can also file a Notice of Federal Tax Lien against you (a step the agency takes to help ensure taxpayers eventually pay their back taxes), and they may apply your future tax refunds towards your outstanding bill as well.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_heading title=”How Do I Request Currently-Not-Collectible Status?” _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” title_level=”h3″ title_font=”||||||||” custom_margin=”0px||10px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_heading][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”||17px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Taxpayers can submit a CNC request directly to the IRS, although it often helps to consult with a tax attorney or similarly qualified tax professional. Like many tax issues, an experienced tax professional can help with navigating the CNC submission process and help ensure all the proper “i’s” have been dotted and “t’s” crossed.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#CECECE” _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_blurb title=”Have additional questions about filing for CNC status?” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”||divi||400″ icon_color=”#1C50A4″ image_icon_background_color=”RGBA(255,255,255,0)” icon_placement=”left” content_max_width=”100%” _builder_version=”4.23.4″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h3″ header_font=”||||||||” header_font_size=”18px” module_alignment=”center” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Optima’s tax professionals are here to help. We offer a range of tax relief services. Call and receive a free consultation with one of our tax associates today.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#f9f9f9″ global_module=”12172″ saved_tabs=”all” locked=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row admin_label=”TrustPilot Carousel” _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”50px||50px||true|false” custom_padding=”10px||10px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_code _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Trustpilot

[/et_pb_code][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”3_5,2_5″ disabled_on=”on|on|off” _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”rgba(234,234,234,0.5)” custom_margin=”70px|auto|60px|auto|false|false” custom_padding=”20px||20px|30px|true|false” border_color_all=”#1C50A4″ border_width_left=”6px” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.23″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”||||||||” header_2_text_color=”#1C50A4″ header_2_font_size=”22px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Let Affordable Tax Relief Help

Call 1-800-536-0734 for a free consultation.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_button button_text=”GET TAX RELIEF” button_alignment=”right” button_alignment_tablet=”center” button_alignment_phone=”center” button_alignment_last_edited=”on|desktop” module_class=”lightbox-trigger-help” _builder_version=”4.23″ _module_preset=”6ead079b-43da-4313-8700-0192b4421332″ custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”14px” button_text_color=”#040011″ button_bg_color=”#7CDA24″ button_border_width=”0px” button_border_color=”#0C71C3″ button_border_radius=”60px” button_letter_spacing=”0.1px” button_font=”Poppins|600||on|||||” button_icon=”E||divi||400″ custom_margin=”5px|30px|5px||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”||||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”20px||||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_padding=”10px|35px|10px|35px|true|true” custom_padding_tablet=”15px|45px|15px|45px|false|true” custom_padding_phone=”15px|45px|15px|45px|true|true” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” animation_style=”fade” button_text_size_tablet=”16px” button_text_size_phone=”14px” button_text_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” button_letter_spacing__hover=”0.3px” button_letter_spacing__hover_enabled=”on|hover”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row disabled_on=”off|off|on” _builder_version=”4.23″ _module_preset=”default” module_alignment=”center” module_alignment_tablet=”” module_alignment_phone=”center” module_alignment_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.23″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”||||||||” header_2_font_size=”22px” text_orientation=”center” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]
